verbs.description: [ARG1: at least 12] [V: displaced] [ARGM-TMP: after dc apartment fire shortly after midnight] firefighters arrived to the 1300 block of alabama avenue in southeast d c to put out a fire that spread from the first floor to the second and third floors of a three story apartment building apartment d c ems
